name: texture walls
desc: Project images onto surfaces such as walls of buildings to add more realism to your visualizations.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Azimuth Inclination
properties.desc: The Azimuth defines the compass direction from the camera eye point towards the model.  Inclination defines the angle from the camera's eye point towards the model. These values in this case apply to the orientation of the image itself.

properties.name: Roll
properties.desc: Roll describes the rotation of the camera itself along it's direction of view.

properties.name: Mirror
properties.desc: The Mirror toggle will change the behaviour of the module in cases where the size of the image is smaller than that of the surface it is being mapped onto.  When this toggle is turned off the image will just repeat when the image reaches its maximum resolution. If this toggle is turned on the image will instead flip over when it reaches its maximum resolution.  This can make a more seamless texture when using certain images.

properties.name: X Size
properties.desc: The X Size value will scale the size of the image in the x direction.

properties.name: X Offset
properties.desc: This X Offset value will cause the image to shift in the x direction when being mapped onto the surface.

properties.name: Y Size
properties.desc: The Y Size value will scale the size of the image in the y direction.

properties.name: Y Offset
properties.desc: The Y Offset value will cause the image to shift in the y direction when being mapped onto the surface.

properties.name: Map Data
properties.desc: The Map Data toggle when turned on will cause the first nodal data component to be displayed along with the image.  NOTE: Since the data value is represented as a color in the display the same as the image, there will be a blending of the two when this option is used.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.

properties.name: Brightness
properties.desc: The Brightness slider can either add or remove brightness from every pixel.

properties.name: Contrast
properties.desc: The Contrast slider can either add or remove contrast from every pixel. Making bright spots brighter and dark spots darker

properties.name: Gamma Correction Red
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the red channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Green
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the green channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Blue
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the blue channel.
